    Compute velocity based on Engbert & Kliegl (2003)

    compute_velocity.Rd

    Compute velocity based on Engbert & Kliegl (2003)

    compute_velocity(x, trial, sample_rate, velocity_time_window)

    Arguments

    x

    Vector of values

    trial

    Vector of trial indexes.

    sample_rate

    Sample rate of the recording in Hz.

    velocity_time_window

    Time window in milliseconds relative to the sample that is used to compute the velocity.

    Value

    vector of float

    Examples

    compute_velocity(rnorm(100), rep(1, 100), 500, 20)
#>   [1]           NA           NA           NA           NA           NA
